text: 17:21 Jon 10:16; 10:38; 17:11; Rom 12:5; Galesia 3:28Egha gumazir kaba bar navir vamɨra ikiasa kɨ ifonge. Afeziam, nɨ nan aven itima kɨ nɨn aven iti, ezɨ kamaghɨra me gan aven ikiasa kɨ ifonge. Eghtɨ nguazimɨn gumazamiziba nɨghnɨzir gavgavim ikɨ egh fogh suam, nɨ na amadazɨ kɨ ize. Kamaghɨn kɨ ghaze, me bar navir vamɨra ikɨ.
